description: Details of the ultimate parent company

isUk.description: Indicate whether the ultimate parent company is a UK company

countryOfIncorporation.description:
Country of incorporation where the ultimate parent company is not a UK company
A valid ISO 3166-1 2 Alpha Country Code. For example: US
